tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    sale_date DATE,
    encryption_key VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_data ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_name VARCHAR(50), 
    product_name VARCHAR(50), 
    price DECIMAL, 
    sales_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    sale_amount DECIMAL,
    sale_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE access_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    action VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
